item.description:
Been a member of this Meetup but never attended any events? Here's a great opportunity to change that!

We really want to meet all the folks whose names and pictures we see on our Meetup, but whom we have yet to meet in person. The Watch City Brewing Company in Waltham is a great informal location, ideal to mix and mingle and relax at the end of the week. So come along and have a fun and friendly Friday evening with everyone.

Alternatively, if you like great grub and/or very fresh micro-brewed beer, then this is the place for you, so c'mon down & join us!!!!

Robyn will be out of town this Friday, so Elaine will be hosting this event. Any questions, please contact Elaine at E-mail Elaine

Directions to Watch City:

From 128 North/South, take Exit 26 (Rt 20 East).

Follow Rt 20 East for approximately 1 1/2 miles (7 lights) through downtown Waltham until you see Sovereign Bank on your right. Take that right onto Moody Street. Follow Moody Street until the second set of lights.

Watch City is directly on the left at the intersection of Moody and Pine. There is parking (free after 6 PM) behind the restaurant. Just take the left at Pine Street and the second left after the building.

If you prefer public transportation, the Waltham Commuter Rail Station is just off Moody Street, approx. 2 blocks away from Watch City ["staggering distance" according to some of the locals ? :)].
Waltham is on the Fitchburg Commuter Rail line, fourth stop after leaving from North Station in downtown Boston.

NOTE:
Be careful where you park in Waltham.
Make sure you park in one of the Municipal Parking lots, or in the Watch City parking lot (which is FREE from 6pm onwards).
If you happen to park in the lots in front of or behind the Enterprise Car Rental Agency on Moody Street, your car WILL be towed. It is big bucks and a lot of hassle to retrieve your card from the Tow Yard (We speak from personal experience!).
item.how_to_find_us: Elaine will be at the bar from 6pm-7pm
item.name: Mix & Mingle at the Watch City Brewing Co. in Waltham
